alerts.title: Community Attention Update
alerts.body:
ICE-related discussion intensity increased in your area today compared to recent baseline.

This reflects a change in public conversation, not confirmation of specific events or locations.

alerts.title: Sustained Civic Focus Detected
alerts.body:
ICE-related topics have remained elevated in your area over the past day.

Patterns are based on aggregated public information and opt-in reports.

context: This digest reflects patterns in aggregated public information. It does not indicate specific events, locations, or activities.
